Container.Name: Storage Analyzer
Container.Overview: Storage Analyzer is a comprehensive tool for analyzing disk usage, finding duplicate files, and managing storage on unRAID systems. It provides detailed analytics, file type breakdowns, and helps identify space usage patterns.
Container.Description:
Storage Analyzer provides comprehensive storage analysis for unRAID systems including:
• Disk usage analysis and visualization • Duplicate file detection and management • File type breakdown and analytics • Folder size analysis and usage explorer • Media file detection and organization • Customizable scan settings and exclusions • Multiple theme support (unRAID, Plex, Emby, Jellyfin, Dark, Light, Dark Lime) • Real-time scan status and progress tracking • Export capabilities for reports and data
Perfect for unRAID users who want to understand their storage usage, find duplicate files, and optimize their media library organization.
